metadata.name: Banner #1
metadata.description:
The Painted Banners (for Adventurers) are 10,603 houses as depicted in the novel 'The Painter'. All elements of this collection are hand-painted and hand-drawn (on parchment) by the in-real-life version of the main character. 

Banners are the society and politics layer for the Lootverse and are narrative scaffolding for stories and worldbuilding. 

Banners will play a key role in future versions of our everyone-vs-everyone game, ‘Call the Banners’.

Learn more at BannersNFT.com
